statements: SELECT * FROM bus_tracking;
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude FROM bus_tracking;
SELECT bus_id, last_updated FROM bus_tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM bus_tracking WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude FROM bus_tracking WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT * FROM bus_tracking WHERE latitude > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude FROM bus_tracking WHERE longitude < -100 ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude, last_updated FROM bus_tracking WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY bus_id DESC
SELECT bus_id, last_updated FROM bus_tracking ORDER BY latitude, longitude ASC
SELECT * FROM bus_tracking WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -80 AND -70 ORDER BY bus_id
SELECT * FROM buses
SELECT bus_id, route_id FROM buses WHERE arrival_time >= NOW()
SELECT bus_id, route_id FROM buses WHERE departure_time < '2022-12-31'
SELECT bus_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM buses ORDER BY arrival_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM buses
SELECT bus_id, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM buses WHERE route_id=5 ORDER BY arrival_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT train_id, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM trains WHERE route_id=3 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT bus_id, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM buses WHERE route_id=7 AND arrival_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT train_id, route_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM trains WHERE arrival_time < NOW() ORDER BY arrival_time;
SELECT bus_id, route_id, arrival_time AS arrival, departure_time AS departure FROM buses WHERE route_id=9 ORDER BY departure ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM BusLocation WHERE bus_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM TrainLocation WHERE train_id = 2;
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM BusLocation;
SELECT train_id, longitude, timestamp FROM TrainLocation WHERE train_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE arrival_time >= '2022-01-01' AND departure_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM BusLocation WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < -20
SELECT train_id, latitude, longitude FROM TrainLocation WHERE train_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT schedule_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM Schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 2 AND arrival_time < NOW()
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM BusLocation WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM BusLocation WHERE longitude >= -30 ORDER BY latitude ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM BusLocations;
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude FROM TrainLocations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT bus_id, status FROM BusStatus WHERE status = 'Running';
SELECT * FROM TrainStatus ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT train_id, timestamp FROM TrainLocations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM BusLocations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT bus_id, latitude, longitude FROM BusLocations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;
SELECT bus_id, timestamp FROM BusLocations WHERE bus_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT bus_id, status, last_updated FROM BusStatus WHERE status = 'delayed';
SELECT train_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM TrainLocations WHERE train_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM bus_routes
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM train_routes
SELECT route_id, route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM bus_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT route_id, gps_timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM train_gps_data WHERE route_id = 3
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_time, user_id, transport_type FROM passenger_notifications
SELECT * FROM bus_routes
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM train_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT * FROM bus_gps_data WHERE route_id = 5
SELECT gps_id, gps_timestamp FROM train_gps_data WHERE route_id = 7 ORDER BY gps_timestamp DESC
SELECT message, notification_time FROM passenger_notifications WHERE transport_type = 'bus'
